[[inst_hl_lbu_po]]
==== HL.LBU.PO

*Syntax:* hl.lbu.po [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<<shamt>], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lbu_po.svg[HL.LBU.PO encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/POST_INDEX
